text: The doctor treated me very kindly. He explained things in a way that was as easy to understand as possible for a foreigner who doesn't speak English. Thank you. The nurse was also kind.
Went down on a weekday morning to treat a cut, Dr Lim was very professional yet approachable. Consultation prices are reasonable too. Staff is also quite friendly.
Loved going here previously but the new nurses are quite green. Not very experienced with handling the documents.

Dr. Lim and his team are outstanding! They’re very responsive, caring, and knowledgeable. Dr. Lim is our family doctor, and he consistently provides excellent care for our toddler and elderly parents. He always gets it right and helps us get back on our feet quickly. We’re happy to recommend this clinic anytime.
I came here for the pfizer vaccine, Dr Lim is attentive and detailed. Also the clinic is clean and no waiting time.
